text: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا دَاوُۥدَ مِنَّا فَضْلًا ۖ يَـٰجِبَالُ أَوِّبِى مَعَهُۥ وَٱلطَّيْرَ ۖ وَأَلَنَّا لَهُ ٱلْحَدِيدَ

translation.en.sahih: And We certainly gave David from Us bounty. [We said], "O mountains, repeat [Our] praises with him, and the birds [as well]." And We made pliable for him iron,
translation.id.indonesian: Dan sesungguhnya telah Kami berikan kepada Daud kurnia dari Kami. (Kami berfirman): "Hai gunung-gunung dan burung-burung, bertasbihlah berulang-ulang bersama Daud", dan Kami telah melunakkan besi untuknya,
